all_coupons.subject: Claim Your Space: GHC 25 Day Passes On Sale Now

offers.offer_description: Choose any single day that works for you.
Join us for Tuesday + Wednesday or Thursday + Friday—whichever fuels your goals.

all_coupons.subject: Live today: see the future of graphics and physical AI

offers.offer_description: Attendees of the Educators' Day session can enjoy an NVIDIA-sponsored lunch after the session.
offers.terms_conditions: Must attend the Educators' Day session.
offers.call_to_action: Engage with top educators, stay updated on the latest NVIDIA technology and research, enhance your curriculum, and better prepare the workforce of tomorrow.

offers.offer_title: Free certification exams for full conference attendees
offers.offer_description: Full conference attendees can take technical certifications, including the new OpenUSD Certification Exam, at no cost.
offers.terms_conditions: Requires full conference attendance at SIGGRAPH.

offers.offer_description: Purchase Rapid Rewards® points and receive a percent discount on points. The discount percentage is specified on the landing page after logging in. A minimum point-purchase threshold must be met on a per-transaction basis to qualify for the discount.
offers.terms_conditions: Offer is valid between July 29, 2025 12:00:01 a.m. CT and August 20, 2025 11:59:59 p.m. CT. A valid credit card is required. A minimum point-purchase threshold must be met on a per-transaction basis. Daily maximum of 60,000 points can be purchased. Transactions are nonrefundable and nonreversible. Offer is only valid for the Member receiving the email and by clicking the link within the email. Gifted and transferred point transactions are not included. Purchased points do not count toward A-List, A-List Preferred, or Companion Pass qualification. Prices are in U.S. dollars and include all applicable taxes. Prices are valid while logged in to Southwest.com® during the Promotion Period and are subject to change. Points may take up to 72 hours to post.
